name: Alta5, Inc
description: Developer of a stock market analysis platform designed to build bots for the stock market. The company's stock market analysis platform offers to backtest, automate, and run the entire algorithmic trading strategies with no coding, enabling investors to track their stock data on stock markets to improve efficiency and make proper financial decisions.
